messages.message:
Welcome to the Alien RPG system


I am happy that you are using our system and wish you best of luck.
If you want to give some feedback on the system, I am active on the Foundry Discord (channel #free-league).

MU/TH/ER Instructions.


Please read the @JournalEntry[MU/TH/ER Instructions.] to get the most benefit out of using the system and new features.

Changes in this release.


There are a number of changes in this release which I hope will improve the overall experience.
  1. All GM rolls for Creatures or Hostile tokens are now public by default. But can be made private by using the Chat dropdown and selecting 'Private GM Roll'.
  2. Addded Story Points and Cash Trackers to the Character sheet.
  3. Added 'Roll Crit' button for Characters and Synthetics.
  4. On the Inventory tabs, left clicking on an item's context menu will open the item in edit mode. Right click still shows the context menu with edit and delete.
  5. Changed the currency fields to just display a $ sign and no units (this will only show on new input).
  6. A PC having the 'Nerves of Steel' Talent will automatically add -2 to Stress rolls.
  7. Chat message for stress rolls now shows the net modifier. A tooltip shows the individual modifiers.
  8. On the Synthetic sheet, moved 'Imitate Human Panic and Push' to the bottom.
  9. On the Character sheet, moved the Radiation tracker to the Conditions block.
  10. Corrected a bug with the encumbrance bar no showing at all!
  11. Corrected a bug in chat with the stress dice not showing for some languages.
  12. Corrected chat text message issue for rolls displaying 'Following the Push...' when they were not pushed.

Please read the @JournalEntry[MU/TH/ER Instructions.] to get the most benefit out of using the system and new features.

Changes in this release (1.3.7).


There are a number of changes in this release which I hope will improve the overall experience.
NOTE: This will be the final release for Foundry VTT version 0.7.9.
  1. Added a tooltip to items edit icon showing Left Click to Edit, Right Click to open context menu. (the most asked question!).
  2. Added new Item type specialty to allow custom career options and sub-careers to be added.
    These can be dragged on to the character sheet (characters and Synthetics) and appear on the General tab.
  3. Added Range for weapons to the Items Tab.
  4. Added GM configuration option to suppress initiative rolls being displayed in chat.
  5. Updated Spanish Language translations with thanks to KaWeNGoD
  6. Improved combat tracker compatibility with modules using libwrapper and DM9290 Your Tokens Visible module.
  7. Corrected issue with Inventory headings not being localized.
  8. Corrected issue with some item types showing options for food power etc.
  9. Corrected issue where the currency field would show $NAN on a minor change or non numeric input.

Please read the @JournalEntry[MU/TH/ER Instructions.] to get the most benefit out of using the system and new features.

Head's up


I plan to release a new version of Alien RPG and the Premium modules when the new Foundry 0.8 is released in stable. This is however not tested with the same rigour and time as other releases, so take care before you upgrade and make sure to make a backup of your '\FoundryVTT\Data' in advance.
Currently there is not a version of the system or Premium modules that will work under FVTT 0.8.x.
I am testing a new version and will release the details as soon as I are satisfied it is stable.

Foundry 0.8.6.


Version 2.0.0 of Alien RPG is a compatibility release for Foundry 0.8.6.
This version has a couple of minor bug fixes but no new features.

Premium Modules:
Updates to the import scripts for the premium modules along with other fixes have been sent to Free League to upload to their site. As soon as I am aware they have been updated I will send out another message.

Before upgrading Foundry, make sure you have a backup of your worlds



Please read the @JournalEntry[MU/TH/ER Instructions.] to get the most benefit out of using the system and features.
